lead_paragraph: Houston Astros pitcher Brandon Backe was among 10 people arrested during a brawl with the police at a weekend wedding reception in a hotel bar in Galveston, Tex. A police spokesman, Capt. Walter Braun, said an internal affairs investigation had been started. The 30-year-old Backe, a member of the wedding party, ignored orders from the police to back away from the fight, and struggled with officers who attempted to handcuff him, according to police reports. He was charged with two misdemeanors and released on $1,500 bond.
